contest-event.event-date:
April 19, 1902 D Morley Contest
Morley Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
morley-contest
None
Own Choice from a Specified List
Nelson Cricket Field, Morley Promoted by Morley Brass Band Choice of test pieces: "Euryanthe", "Songs of Other Days" or "Mari di Rohan". Prizes - 1st £8, 2nd £5, 3rd £3, 4th £2, 5th £1. March: 1. Cleckheaton, 2. Holme. 12 bands competed.
March 25, 2014, 9:24 p.m. July 2, 2018, 7:32 a.m.
1 Shipley Brass Band John Paley Maria di Rohan
2 Cleckheaton Victoria Angus Holden Euryanthe [arr. Godfrey]
3 Sowerby Bridge Subscription Angus Holden Maria di Rohan
4 Holme Silver (Disposables UK Group) Band Angus Holden Euryanthe [arr. Godfrey]
5 Hepworth Band Angus Holden Euryanthe [arr. Godfrey]
Unknown Result Armley and Wortley Prize Band H. Mallinson Maria di Rohan
Unknown Result Birstall Old Tom Stubley Euryanthe [arr. Godfrey]
Unknown Result Thornhill Brass John Brook Euryanthe [arr. Godfrey]
Unknown Result Hinchliffe Mill Band Joseph Paley Euryanthe [arr. Godfrey]
Unknown Result Carlton Temperance A. Newton Songs of Other Days
Unknown Result Wakefield Belle Vue L. Allison Maria di Rohan
Unknown Result Gawthorpe Victoria Band Benjamin Denton Jackson Maria di Rohan
